planner.title: Design your own GRÖNLID sofa
planner.description: Our GRÖNLID planner will help you plan an ultra-comfortable sofa for you, your family and friends. Put together the deep, cosy seating elements in such a way that everything looks beautifully inviting and choose a nice colour for your cover. Let's go!
planner.label: Planner
